ygData.subject: Spells, This Forum,Etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: I can feel the wrath now...  but I am ready for the comments. If I may comment - I don t believe that us discussing what would be nice for Wizard spells
ygData.messageBody:
I can feel the wrath now... but I am ready for the comments.

If I may comment - I don't believe that us discussing what 'would be nice' for Wizard spells really helps us be Wizards. I really believe that if we continue to complain or comment on the apparent lack of spells/problems with spells that we have, we are not going to achieve what I believe this mailing list was setup for. This list is to share information between all Wizards within Norrath ! We are going to lose potential and current subscribers (me and I'm sure others), thus losing valuable shared information because of our ranting and raving about our class. Remember, Verant is probably not reading this forum..

My suggestion: Let's talk about ideas and share information that will help each other play the class that we chose to play.

So far, the most useful thing I have read (besides Spoiler information) is the 'bug' that allows our Eye of Zoom to unlock doors. I think that's great !!

Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
